meanings.definition: The phenomenon of multiple embryos developing from a single fertilized egg.
meanings.sent1: In polyembryonies, several embryos grow from one egg.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study polyembryonies to understand how it happens.
meanings.sent3: The polyembryonies in the lab experiment surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a polyembryonies of colorful flowers blooming together.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained polyembryonies with detailed illustrations.

meanings.definition: The condition of having more than one embryo in a seed.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was amazed by the polyembryonies in the seed he planted.
meanings.sent2: Polyembryonies can lead to stronger plants with multiple embryos.
meanings.sent3: The polyembryonies in the seed packet made the gardener smile.
meanings.sent4: The concept of polyembryonies in seeds is like a treasure chest waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The polyembryonies within the seed held the promise of new life.
